chargeHist.descr: Operating While Revoked (Rev due to alc/contr subst/refusal)
Operating While Revoked (Rev due to alc/contr subst/refusal)

result.execSummary:
The defendant was charged with both OWI (2nd) and Operating w/ PAC (2nd). The defendant was found guilty of OWI (2nd) and the other charge, Operating w/ PAC (2nd) was dismissed by the court.

  • Devin G Schultz was found guilty of Vehicle Operator Flee/Elude Officer, a class I felony, Wisconsin Statutes 346.04(3).
  • Devin G Schultz was found guilty of OWI (2nd), an unclassified misdemeanor, Wisconsin Statutes 346.63(1)(a).

Charge(s) in this case were read in to this or other case(s). A "read in" charge is a charge that is dismissed as part of a plea agreement, however:

  • The defendant agrees to have the court consider the charge(s) when sentencing for another crime, under Wis. Stats. 973.20(1g)(b); and
  • The defendant cannot be prosecuted for these charge(s) in the future.

Notice to employers: It may be a violation of state law to discriminate against a job applicant because of an arrest or conviction record. Generally speaking, an employer may refuse to hire an applicant on the basis of a conviction only if the circumstances of the conviction substantially relate to the particular job. For more information, see Wisconsin Statute 111.335 and the Department of Workforce Development's publication, Arrest and Conviction Records under the Law.

Pretrial Incarceration Credit form filed.
Court received information from Wisconsin Community Services regarding defendant's compliance/non-compliance.

Defendant Devin G Schultz in court with attorney Michael F Torphy.  Melissa Zilavy appeared for the State of Wisconsin.


Court orders the following:

Count 1:
- Total sentence: 3 years (Initial Confinement: 1 year 6 months, Extended Supervision: 1 year 6 months) STAYED.  Credit for 60 days if revoked.
- Defendant IS eligible for Substance Abuse Program
-2 years Probation. 
- Court costs of $268.00; cash bail to be applied.  Any remaining fine to be paid as a Condition of Probation
- DNA Surcharge of $250.00; cash bail to be applied.  Any remaining surcharge to be paid as a Condition of Probation
- Defendant to provide DNA sample, if not yet provided, immediately if in custody otherwise within (3) business days at the Waukesha County Sheriff Department.
- Conditions of Probation:  Maintain absolute sobriety/Random UAs.  No use or possession of alcohol/drug paraphernalia/drugs without a valid prescription.  Continue with AODA treatment.  Maintain full-time employment and/or school.  
CONDITION TIME: 60 days - NON WORKING HOURS WITH STANDARD RELEASE CONDITIONS - To commence May 4, 2015 by 7:00 pm.

Count 2:
- 6 months jail CONSECUTIVE to Count 1.  STAYED 
- 2 years Probation
- 16 months Drivers License Revocation. 
- 16 months Ignition Interlock on any vehicle TITLED OR REGISTERED to defendant 
- Alcohol Assessment
- Fine of $1,179.00 to be paid as a Condition of Probation
- Blood Test Reimbursement of $35.00 paid through Waukesha County Circuit Court to be forwarded to Butler Police Department
- DNA Surcharge waived
- DNA Sample waived
- Conditions of Probation:  Same as Count 1.
CONDITION TIME: 60 days - NON WORKING HOURS WITH STANDARD RELEASE CONDITIONS CONSECUTIVE to Condition time in Count 1.
